item.title: The Color of Law
item.description: Summary Rothstein’s book is a fantastic rebuttal to basically everything I learned about segregation in my high school history classes. De facto segregation is a myth, and we can’t fight back against de jure segregation without a means of de jure integration.

item.title: Empire of Illusion
item.description: Context Hedges wrote Empire of Illusion during 2009, during the middle of an economic recession. Near the midway point of Obama’s second term.
